forum.content:
Don't like don't choose, like a stick.
Together is a kind of fate, don't let the one who likes you cry sad,
Cherish every minute, good memories of happiness and laughter should be left to.
No matter what happens, don't say you doesn't like me,
Do not easily give up this feeling, because, the next stop is not better than I.
A good man can withstand the temptation, good women endure loneliness.
forum.title: 是非題選擇題❌⭕️
